name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.chainSummarization
semantic_context: Transforms text into a concise summary

notice.displayName: Save time with an example of how this node works
notice.name: notice

type.name: type
type.description: The type of summarization to run

options.name: Map Reduce (Recommended)
options.description: Summarize each document (or chunk) individually, then summarize those summaries

options.name: Refine
options.description: Summarize the first document (or chunk). Then update that summary based on the next document (or chunk), and repeat.

options.name: Stuff
options.description: Pass all documents (or chunks) at once. Ideal for small datasets.

type.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。
